::Shadow Wing::

She felt adventurous and wanted to see just how far she could control 
her new form.  She tried a new connection, one to the protoforms 
spine, and tried to make the bot sit up.  It took a lot of effort and 
energy, but she finally got the bot to sit upright on the table. 

"HOLY MATRIX!  I DID IT! I DID IT! YEAHHHHOOOO!" were the words that 
appeared on the screen.  

But the connection drained to much energy and she lost the 
connection.  the bot fell back onto the table with a loud bang.  
She felt a little energy drained, but happy at her accomplishment.  
But, the form didn't feel like it was apart of her.  More like a 
remote control.  She sighed and hoped that Lunarpine would return 
soon.  She missed him terrably.
